mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,chanpin.chanpin_name as chanpinName ,chanpin.chanpin_types as chanpinTypes ,chanpin.chanpin_photo as chanpinPhoto ,chanpin.chanpin_content as chanpinContent ,chanpin.insert_time as insertTime ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_time as yonghuTime ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM chanpin_liuyan a left JOIN chanpin chanpin ON a.chanpin_id = chanpin.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.chanpin_id = #{params.chanpinId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.chanpin_liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinLiuyanContent},'%')
and a.reply_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and chanpin.chanpin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinName},'%')
and chanpin.chanpin_types = #{params.chanpinTypes}
and chanpin.chanpin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chanpin.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chanpin.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
